basics.name: Philip Sequeira
basics.label: Shidler Undergraduate
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.B.A. in Management Information Systems in the Shidler College of Business at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Summer, 2021.

education.institution: Community College of the Air Force
Defense Language Institute Foreign Language Center

highlights: Initiate and spearhead a wide range of new projects across the organization to optimize efficiency using existing resources
Create and maintain training programs for staff
Produce video content for internal and external training and promotional use through social media
Improve customer experience through user experience design input based on direct customer support analysis
Test upcoming software updates and communicate feedback with developers

work.summary: Wing Force Readiness Program Manager, Operations Training Supervisor, Information Technology Equipment Custodian, Cryptologic Operator
highlights: Ensure legal requirements for enterprise-wide information system met across 21 geographically separate organizations monthly
Tenaciously managed accomplishment of vital information system training for executive leaders in 6000+ person organization daily
Operated $50 billion information system, authoring or contributing to over 1000 time-sensitive, classified intelligence reports
Instructed detailed technical information to more than 500 personnel to operate critical information systems over 3 year period
Monitored 40+ pieces of information technology equipment over two year period, maintained 100% accountability
Raised $3000 in charity for youth in the Philippines following natural disaster.

awards.title: Air Force Commendation Medal
awards.summary: Significant contributions to the organization over a 4 year period.
